dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5263 IH: To require approval from the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for any Federal manufactured home and safety standards, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Flood (for himself and Mr. Cleaver) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require approval from the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for any Federal manufactured home and safety standards, and for other purposes.

section.header: Primary authority to establish manufactured home construction and safety standards
section.text: The Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5401 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 603(7), by inserting energy efficiency, after design,; and
in section 604, by adding at the end the following new subsection:
The Secretary shall have the primary authority to establish Federal manufactured home construction and safety standards.

subparagraph.text: The head of any Federal agency that seeks to establish a Federal manufactured home construction and safety standard on or after the date of the enactment of this subsection—

clause.text: shall submit to the Secretary a proposal describing such standard; and
may not establish such standard without approval from the Secretary.

subparagraph.text: The Secretary shall reject the standards described in subparagraph (A)—

clause.text: if the standards would significantly increase the cost of producing manufactured homes, as determined by the Secretary;
if the standards conflict with existing manufactured home construction and safety standards established by the Secretary; or
for any other reason as determined appropriate by the Secretary.

subparagraph.text: Nothing in this subsection shall be construed to require the Secretary to establish new or revised Federal manufactured home construction and safety standards.
